content: point r 16- *decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 st repeat from * around 18 r 17- *decrease 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * around 12 r 18- decrease around 6 fasten_off use the tail to close the opening and weave in ends eyes if you aren t using post eyes use black yarn to sew 2 eyes between r 8/9 3
